name: Redtape
description:
EXPLORE A CORPORATE BUILDING THAT'S IN THE DEPTHS OF HELL

Redtape is an idiom referring to regulations or conformity to formal rules or standards which are claimed to be excessive, rigid or redundant, or to bureaucracy claimed to hinder or prevent action or decision-making.

WASD - Move
SHIFT - Hide paper 
SPACE - Jump
MOUSE - Interaction 

Game artist: Francisco Lucas @ciscookiess Francisco_ Unreal Engine Programmer:  Nathan Gabriel NeitherNathan @NeitherNathan

We still don’t put sound, but you can listen some songs that we heard during the development of the game. They are the devil's favorite songs too:

Some bugs and crashes are still being resolved.
